entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
